NewsItem.HEADLINE: Carrier Wi-Fi and LTE-U 2017 Forecast Update
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This six-month forecast update provides the latest view of the Carrier Wi-Fi and Unlicensed LTE infrastructure market, including LAA, LWA, CBRS, Multefire.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: A five-year forecast is included for access points of various types that include LWA, LAA, CBRS, Multefire. This update provides shipment, pricing, revenue, and market share data for 2017 through 2022.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: LWA LAA LWIP Multefire Carrier WiFi access point ap enodeb
